attributes.action: use the windfall tax on bankers' bonuses to offset budget cuts in higher education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the economic crisis, the Chancellor has decided to massively cut the higher education budget, including the science and research budgets and student support. The treasury however, faces an unexpectedly high income (potentially £2bn) from the windfall tax on bonuses.  We propose that this unanticipated income be used to protect higher education from spending cuts,     as this sector represents the seed-corn of our future economic growth.
